long_desc.thetext: Cyrus IMAP 2.3.7 shows out lots of warnings (saa warn.log) while compiling on SUN Solaris 9 sparc with Sun Studio 11. I have written some patches for correction of these warnings. Please review them.

Created an attachment (id=478) warning while compiling Cyrus IMAP
System detail:
Solaris 9/05 sparc Sun Studio 11 (Sun C 5.8 2005/10/13) Berkeley DB 4.4.20 + vendor patches Cyrus-SASL 2.1.22 Heimdal Kerberos 0.7.2 NetSNMP 5.2.3 OpenLDAP 2.3.30 OpenSSL 0.9.8d Perl 5.8.8 TCP-Wrappers 7.6 Zlib 1.2.3
All packages are build as 64-bit applications (cc -xarch=v9 -xO5 -xspace).
Thanks a lot!

Created an attachment (id=479) patch for ptclient/afskrb.c
patch for warning/error:
"afskrb.c", line 43: syntax error before or at: __attribute__ "afskrb.c", line 43: warning: old-style declaration or incorrect type for: __attribute__ "afskrb.c", line 44: warning: syntax error: empty declaration "afskrb.c", line 518: warning: implicit function declaration: fatal "afskrb.c", line 43: warning: null dimension: rcsid cc: acomp failed for afskrb.c

Created an attachment (id=480) patch for ptclient/ldap.c
patch for error/warning:
"ldap.c", line 43: syntax error before or at: __attribute__ "ldap.c", line 43: warning: old-style declaration or incorrect type for: __attribute__ "ldap.c", line 44: warning: syntax error: empty declaration "ldap.c", line 217: cannot recover from previous errors cc: acomp failed for ldap.c gmake[1]: *** [ldap.o] Error 2

Without looking in detail at all the patches, I tried to build my RedHat/Fedora RPMs with them. All goes well but not the master.c patch https://bugzilla.andrew.cmu.edu/attachment.cgi?id=504&action=view which results in alot of errors, starting like this:
In file included from master.c:102: cyrusMasterMIB.h: In function `config_require': cyrusMasterMIB.h:19: error: syntax error before "FindVarMethod" In file included from master.c:104: masterconf.h:47: error: storage class specified for parameter `masterconf_init' masterconf.h:49: warning: empty declaration masterconf.h:52: error: storage class specified for parameter `masterconf_getstring' masterconf.h:54: error: storage class specified for parameter `masterconf_getint' masterconf.h:56: error: storage class specified for parameter `masterconf_getswitch'

Created an attachment (id=520) patch for master/master.c
patch for warning:
"master.c", line 1907: warning: implicit function declaration: netsnmp_enable_subagent "master.c", line 1925: warning: implicit function declaration: init_cyrusMasterMIB
Thanks, builds fine now. I can't comment on the code itself, it's just to say that it builds for me.

> Thanks, builds fine now. I can't comment on the code itself, it's just to say > that it builds for me.
Thanks a lot!
Committed a few weeks ago
Thanks a lot!
